name: Buildcon, Inc
description: Developer of online construction management platform designed to track and monitor construction processes. The company's platform leverages technology to help engineers and architects to organize themselves, track their workflows, send orders with images and collaborate in one place, enabling clients to ensure on-time delivery of all projects with increasing efficiency.
one_liner: Developer of online construction management platform designed to track and monitor construction processes. The company's platform leverages technology to help engineers and architects to organize themselves, track their workflows, send orders with images and collaborate in one place, enabling clients to ensure on-time delivery of all projects with increasing efficiency.
